fields.name: Beefaroni
fields.description: Ground beef, cheese and tomato sauce mixed together....my favorite dish growing up!
fields.directions:
Step 1
Crumble the ground beef into a large skillet over medium-high heat. Cook, stirring frequently, until evenly browned. Drain.

Step 2
While the ground beef is cooking, bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Add macaroni, and cook until tender, about 8 minutes. Add tomato sauce to the ground beef and bring to a simmer.  Drain the pasta. 

Step 3
Transfer to a large pot, and mix in the ground beef, tomato sauce, and Parmesan cheese.
